login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Input your email and password to login

agreement.title: Terms and Conditions
agreement.text: Do you agree with the terms and conditions?

signup.title: Signup
signup.subtitle: Input your email and password to sign up
signup.alert: Do NOT use the serious password you usually use, because this is a sample app.

confirm.alert: You got verification code from email. Please check your email.
confirm.title: Confirm
confirm.subtitle: Input your email and verification code you got from email

successDialog.title: Verification Success!
successDialog.text: Now you can login! Click Ok to go to the login view

forgot.title: Forgot your password?
forgot.subtitle: Input your email to reset password

reset.title: Reset your password?
reset.subtitle: Input verification code and new password

dialog.title: Verification Success!
dialog.text: Now you got new password! Click Ok to go to the login view

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.message: Make sure that you want to delete your ALL DATA.

passwordErrorDialog.title: Password Validation Failed
passwordErrorDialog.text: Your new passwords are not match.

deleteDialog.title: Are you sure to delete the account?
deleteDialog.text: All your data will be deleted.
